page.title: 07FURNITURE WORKSHOP
page.content: My dad's shop is called Old Farmhouse furniture. He's got three people who come to work at about 8 o'clock and go at half past five. There are another three people who work part-time. My dad or someone who is part-time do pine-stripping to get the old paint of the furniture. There are two vehicles, a car and a van for deliveries. My dad now does fitted kitchens out of pine. Our shop is actually an old farm barn. Keith works most of the time making pine furniture. My dad makes quite a lot of dressers. Roger is the best. He's been here nearly as long as my dad in the shop. I'm going to work in my dad's workshop.
